keyEvents.title: Franky Confronts Usopp About Going Merry
keyEvents.description: At Dock Six, Franky forces Usopp to examine the Going Merry's broken keel and accept the reality that the ship cannot be saved.

keyEvents.title: Usopp Reveals Klabautermann Encounter
keyEvents.description: Usopp confesses to Franky about witnessing the Going Merry's Klabautermann in Skypiea, revealing this deeply personal experience at Dock Six.

keyEvents.title: CP9 Arrives to Confront Franky
keyEvents.description: Kalifa, Kaku, Blueno, and Rob Lucci arrive at Dock Six to confront Franky, with Kalifa knocking out Mozu and Kiwi.

description: Dock Six is Franky's hideout and base of operations in Water 7. It serves as a dismantling facility and headquarters for the Franky Family.
significance: This location is central to several key confrontations during the Water 7 arc, including emotional moments about the Going Merry and battles with CP9.
